auth_type.description: The type of authentication to be performed. Possible values are: 'openid-connect', 'key-auth'.

key_names.description: The names of the headers containing the API key. You can specify multiple header names.

items.description: A string representing an HTTP header name.

scope.description: The unique scope identifier for the plugin configuration.

protocols.description: A set of strings representing HTTP protocols.

service.description: If set, the plugin will only activate when receiving requests via one of the routes belonging to the specified Service. Leave unset for the plugin to activate regardless of the Service being matched.
